availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Richard H. Higgins (Louisville, KY bank teller)

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, bank teller. Virginia native. Teller at the Banking Office of Shreve & Tucker in 1860.

ab.bibl: Henry Tanner, ed., Tanner’s Louisville Directory and Business Advertiser for 1861 (Louisville: Directory Publication and Advertising Agency, 1861), 121. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, 5th Ward City of Louisville, p. 192.
